cast.overview: Paris, France, December 1897. The young playwright Edmond Rostand feels like a failure. Inspiration has abandoned him. Married and father of two children, desperate and penniless, he persuades the great actor Constant Coquelin to perform the main role in his new play. But there is a problem: Coquelin wants to premiere it at Christmas and Edmond has not written a single word.
cast.title: Cyrano, My Love

crew.overview: Paris, France, December 1897. The young playwright Edmond Rostand feels like a failure. Inspiration has abandoned him. Married and father of two children, desperate and penniless, he persuades the great actor Constant Coquelin to perform the main role in his new play. But there is a problem: Coquelin wants to premiere it at Christmas and Edmond has not written a single word.
crew.title: Cyrano, My Love

details.biography: Benjamin Bellecour est un comédien français. Découvert par Stephan Meldegg, il est devenu un des espoirs du théâtre français en partageant l'affiche avec Laurent Terzieff dans Mon lit en zinc. Il est également metteur en scène et auteur de pièces de théâtre français, et codirige avec Salomé Lelouch, le Ciné 13 Théâtre à Paris.
details.name: Benjamin Bellecour
